Reset.content:
**GUILD ARENA TONIGHT AT 9PM.**
PM any of the officers if you want to enlist.

**Mechanics**
- A 6-person PVP. 3 rounds.
- Every round, you are given few minutes to deploy 6 members. Everyone who is online can deploy themselves.
- Once the 6 slots are full, you cannot join anymore until the next round.
-You cannot deploy again once you already deployed in a previous round.
- Each round win is 10 points (max 30 points per matchup).
- At the end of 2 weeks (4 matchups), the top 8 guilds with the most points gets into the championship on Saturday.

Hourly.title: GUILD ARENA
Hourly.content: **Join Guild Arena tonight at 9PM (PH TIME)!** PM any of the officers if you want to join!

08:30PM.title: GUILD BOSS
08:30PM.content: GUILD BOSS is starting in 15 minutes. Check your skills and fairies, eat food for buffs, and get ready yourself ready.

09:00PM.title: GUILD ARENA
09:00PM.content: GUILD ARENA starting in 15 minutes. Gear up and kill them all! Watch as our lineup destroys the opposing guild.
